scripts.serve:chrome: node deploy.js development && cross-env NODE_ENV=serve ENV_PATH=serveChrome vue-cli-service build --watch
scripts.serve:fireFox: node deploy.js development fireFox && cross-env NODE_ENV=serve ENV_PATH=serveFireFox vue-cli-service build-watch
scripts.plugin:chrome: node deploy.js production && cross-env NODE_ENV=production ENV_PATH=productionChrome vue-cli-service build
scripts.plugin:Edg: node deploy.js production && cross-env NODE_ENV=production ENV_PATH=productionEdge vue-cli-service build
scripts.plugin:fireFox: node deploy.js production fireFox && cross-env NODE_ENV=production ENV_PATH=productionFireFox vue-cli-service build && npm run pack
scripts.release:chrome: node deploy.js development && cross-env NODE_ENV=production ENV_PATH=productionReleaseChrome vue-cli-service build
scripts.release:Edg: node deploy.js development && cross-env NODE_ENV=production ENV_PATH=productionReleaseEdge vue-cli-service build
scripts.release:fireFox: node deploy.js development fireFox && cross-env NODE_ENV=production ENV_PATH=productionReleaseFireFox vue-cli-service build
